articles.author: Nikita Prasad
articles.title: Infosys ADR crashes 8% on NYSE after IT major slashes FY25 revenue growth guidance to 1-3% | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Infosys ADR crashed eight per cent to $15.95 on the American stock exchange after the IT major slashed its FY25 revenue guidance to 1-3 per cent from the previous 1.5 -2 per cent in the December quarter.
articles.content: Infosys ADR: American Depository Receipt (ADR) shares of India's second-largest software services provider witnessed a sharp decline on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) after revealing its January-… [+4376 chars]
